messages.title: East Lothian's right to choose
messages.content: There’s a better way. [...] This election is your chance to [...] vote SNP.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposes Brexit, wants Scotland to choose its own future.
Global warming threatens our planet; supports urgent measures to address the climate emergency.
Support local rail and bus services, and implement responsible changes for free transport for the young, elderly, and unemployed.
Opposes privatisation of the NHS and supports a publicly paid service in Scottish hands.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Scotland must decide, not have the outcome of Brexit imposed upon them.

issues.brexitEurope: Opposes Brexit, believes Scotland should have a choice post-Brexit, describes it as the single most important election for a generation.
issues.environment: Global warming threatens our planet; supports urgent measures to address the climate emergency.
issues.health: Opposes privatisation of the NHS and supports a publicly paid service in Scottish hands.

leaflet.personalStatement: I’ll work for a fairer society, for all of those in East Lothian and not just the privileged few.

images.caption: Kenny MacAskill with supporters, holding a Scottish flag with EU stars.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet focuses on the importance of the election in the context of Brexit and calls for Scotland to have the right to choose its own future.
